name: n8n-nodes-base.awsElb
semantic_context: Sends data to AWS ELB API

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。 与鉴权相关，注意不要在公共日志中输出敏感信息。

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation

options.name: Add
options.description: Add the specified SSL server certificate to the certificate list for the specified HTTPS or TLS listener

options.name: Remove
options.description: Remove the specified certificate from the certificate list for the specified HTTPS or TLS listener

operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

ipAddressType.name: ipAddressType
ipAddressType.description: The type of IP addresses used by the subnets for your load balancer
ipAddressType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

name.name: name
name.description: This name must be unique per region per account, can have a maximum of 32 characters
name.ai_hint: This name must be unique per region per account, can have a maximum of 32 characters

schema.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

type.name: type
type.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

subnets.name: subnets
subnets.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression
subnets.ai_hint: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: securityGroups
options.description: Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

loadBalancerId.displayName: Load Balancer ARN Name or ID
loadBalancerId.name: loadBalancerId
loadBalancerId.description: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
loadBalancerId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

filters.name: filters

options.name: names
options.description: The names of the load balancers. Multiples can be defined separated by comma.

filters.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

listenerId.name: listenerId
listenerId.description: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
listenerId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

certificateId.name: certificateId
certificateId.description: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer
certificateId.ai_hint: Unique identifier for a particular loadBalancer

conditional_rules: IF resource == 'loadBalancer' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'ipAddressType'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'name'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'schema'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'type'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'create' THEN SHOW parameter 'subnets'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'loadBalancer' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'get' THEN SHOW parameter 'loadBalancerId'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'getMany' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'getMany' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'loadBalancer' AND returnAll == True THEN SHOW parameter 'filters'
IF resource == 'loadBalancer' AND operation == 'delete' THEN SHOW parameter 'loadBalancerId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'operation'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'loadBalancerId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'listenerId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'add' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'getMany' THEN SHOW parameter 'loadBalancerId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'getMany' THEN SHOW parameter 'listenerId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'getMany' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'getMany' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'loadBalancerId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'listenerId'
IF resource == 'listenerCertificate' AND operation == 'remove' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateId'
